column5: damn it
my bf is smoking weed instead of drinking. its working out decently for him
a lot of times i think im dead like im either a ghost or in hell
wish i could get some of those!!!

thanks for tryin to help but yeah i tried welbutrin and strattera first and they didnt help at all. i really need a stim to function unfortunately or i would get off them completely. but there's no way i can do my classes without being able to focus.
did u abuse it? i dont abuse my meds. i used to abuse them but stopped a long time ago
actually, if u legit have severe adhd, you DO need stims for ur brain to function normally. yes u can get by without them but your brain wont work as well as the average normal persons.

actually i only smoked weed 2 days then i stopped. weed is not addictive at all for me. i dont plan to smoke again for at least a month. im using script stims cuz i have adhd. been diagnosed by a psychiatrist. ive had it my whole life. 
kratom is the only thing keeping me from relapsing on meth.

im taking vyvanse bcuz i have adhd. that's why i started abusing meth cuz i didnt know i could get legal adhd meds. but i chose vyvanse cuz its the one with the least potential for abuse. im thinking about switching back to adderall cuz it works better. vyvanse kinda sucks.
if u find anything lmk and if i find anything ill let u know?

i had the same problem before i learned how to play the guitar. had songs in my head, but couldnt so much as record myself singing them correctly. but once i learned guitar i started experimenting with different chords n wrote tons of my own songs. even ones i had no melody for i was able to play the guitar and make stuff up pretty fast. i cant give u any advice except just experiment. the piano is a lot harder than guitar imho i used to play most of my childhood. but stopped in high school. now i am learning it again and have been playin guitar for 5 months. id highly recommend learning guitar if u dont already know it cuz its way easier to write songs with. i know when i was a kid and i tried to write music for my songs on the piano ir was hard af and never worked out. but on th guitar its much simpler.

punk rap, emo rap? i didnt know that was a thing. would like to listen to ur stuff. u got soundcloud or youtube?
by manipulating the world do u mean photos/videos? or do you have a lot of control over your environment?

dude u need a new place to live for sure. installing cameras in the house is a wee bit fucked up. no way would i put up with that. if u didnt already get kicked out, u should just leave. for real ur life sounds like u need to make some changes, take it from someone whos been in a similar boat. you can make your life amazing if youre willing to leave your comfort zone. 

if youre having to be a "mommy" to your boyfriend, and he wont make time to hang out with you, you should break up with him, hes not worth your time. you can do better. ive worked 3 jobs before and still found time to be with the people i love. theres no excuse for him to never hang out with u. 

if your friends are parasitic, find new friends. find people that actually care about you, not just leeches. if you dont have any real friends, do you have any family members you are close to? anyone you can crash on their couch for a while? 

also if your meth habit is impacting your life, you may want to cut back on your usage. im all for meth, its great, but ive let it ruin my life and theres no reason to throw your life away for drugs. maybe try just using once each morning and calling it good, make sure u sleep each night. im not telling you what to do, just giving suggestions. i wish someone had given me advice when i was doing meth and had good for nothing friends, other than people just telling me to get off drugs. 

tbh, living in a vehicle isnt actually that bad especially if youre small enough to sleep in it comfortably. you could try it out just for the hell of it until u find a better place to live. if u would like tips on livin in a car, or if u just would like to chat about whatever, feel free to msg me. i lived in a car for about a year while traveling around the country and working in national parks every now and then. it was the best time of my life and i was able to get by on very little income. 

how is your job going, or have u been fired? i hope youre doing ok. id like to chat if you're down. (im also female if that matters)

ahh, sorry. i dont know, ive never gone thru withdrawal from taking it. but ive taken it every day for a week before then took a break had no problems. i usually only take it 3-4x a week about the same dosage as you. i just dont feel the need to take it every day. if i did id be worried im getting addicted
oh and to actually answer ur question. it improves ur mood a bit, makes u feel motivated and want to do stuff and be productive. for some ppl it makes u horny. makes focusing on things hella easier.
if u have add u will have to take more than most ppl to get high.
as often as u want. but the more u do the higher chance u will get addicted. if u wana do it every day for a week id say take a few days off afterward.
